name: Web for developer company
description: Website for advertising buildings and apartments. Feature of choosing the building via polygon, same logic with floors and apartments and showing the relevant info. Massive data table with filtering and sorting functions. Responsive for all devices. Not released yet, future business use for the development company.
personalContribution: Implementation of all mentioned technologies. Developing a massive data table, responsivity, custom carousel gallery, data fetching. Project management in Jira, tickets creation and tasks delegation, design consulting, project structure logic and swagger structure, testing and bug fixing, error management, design remake, team cooperation in GitLab and code reviews.

name: Custom internal system
description: Internal admin system for all projects of the company. Management of invoices, contracts, suppliers, post and clients. Not released yet, future internal use for the development company.
personalContribution: Use of all mentioned technologies, responsive styling, connection with Flexibee API and then developed custom management according to the clients requirements, Jira, team cooperation in GitLab and code reviews

name: Hike It
description: Graduation project of the long-term course by Czechitas. Website about world long-distance trails. Released and available.
personalContribution: Programming with all mentioned technologies, Coming up with the project idea and theme, planning and time management, project architecture, design in Figma, team cooperation in GitHub, photography and processing photographs in Adobe LightRoom, dark mode theme

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: Web game, homework project of the long-term course by Czechitas. Released and available.
personalContribution: Processing according to the task description. Crating the AI opponent, two versions (one player x AI, player x player on one device).

name: Leviexpress travel booking web
description: Project of the long-term course by Czechitas. Route search and seat selection, imaginary transport provider website. Unpublished, code available on GitHub.
personalContribution: Processing according to the task description.

name: Café Lóra
description: Project of the long-term course by Czechitas. Imaginary Café website for coffee orders. Unpublished, code available on GitHub.
personalContribution: Processing according to the task description. Design and feature implementation.

name: The Arnica Cottage Web

name: Personal Website v1
